title: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis Says Its Next Algorithm Will Eclipse ChatGPT
description: Demis Hassabis says the company is working on a system called Gemini that will draw on techniques that powered AlphaGo to a historic victory over a Go champion in 2016.

title: The US Is Exporting Anti-LGBTQ Hate Online
description: Conspiracy theories and misinformation with their roots in the American right are driving global anti-LGBTQ sentiment—and offline violence.

title: The US Senate Wants to Reign In AI. Good Luck With That
description: With a poor track record on tech regulation, do lawmakers stand a chance?

title: Amazon’s New Robots Are Rolling Out an Automation Revolution
description: A wave of advanced machines is coming to the company’s facilities thanks to better AI and robots smart enough to work with—and without—humans.
